main event: On 25 May 1949, military personnel at Hill Air Force Base, Utah, observed two unidentified flying objects, one circular and dull silver, the other blue on one side and silver on the other, traveling south at high speeds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for a few seconds with both objects reflecting sunlight,At least two military members sighted the objects and both described them differently,The objects were estimated to be flying at altitudes around 9,000 to 14,000 feet,The objects emitted sounds similar to aircraft,The investigation concluded that no data indicated the objects could not be aircraft.
sighted object: two unidentified flying objects (one dull silver and one dark blue/silver)
witness description: military personnel, including an Assistant Air Inspector and a Salvage Officer
